name: jusojs
description: TypeScript client library for Korean road address search using the official juso.go.kr API

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.copy:esm: cp lib/index.js lib/index.mjs && cp lib/index.js.map lib/index.mjs.map && cp lib/types.js lib/types.mjs && cp lib/types.js.map lib/types.mjs.map
scripts.copy:cjs: cp lib-cjs/index.js lib/index.cjs && cp lib-cjs/index.js.map lib/index.cjs.map && cp lib-cjs/types.js lib/types.cjs && cp lib-cjs/types.js.map lib/types.cjs.map && rm -rf lib-cjs
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test
